title: Advanced Diploma in Maintenance and Repair of Concrete Structures
headline: Learn the basics of concrete structures, corrosion of reinforcement, waterproofing and concrete surface repair.
description: In this free online training course, you will learn about how best to maintain and repair concrete structures. The course covers such topics as the significance and fundamentals of corrosion, how to address the deterioration of cementitious systems, the condition assessment of concrete structures, and the strategies and materials for surface repair. You also learn about waterproofing, strengthening and stabilization of these structures.

courseDescription:
In this free online certification course about the maintenance and repair of concrete structures, you will be introduced to the fundamentals of corrosion, notably its mechanism. Through this video-based course, you will learn about construction materials and steel rebars in particular. This course covers the deterioration of cementitious systems, delving deeper into the various attacks concrete structures are prone to, and how to address them. Also, root-cause analyses of the problems of these structures will be highlighted, as well as how to adequately solve them.

Furthermore, this course enables you to explore surface preparation and protective treatments. You will learn about the waterproofing of concrete structures, allowing you to learn better about coatings on concrete infrastructures, with a specific emphasis on industrial application of these coatings for concrete substrate. The needs and strategies to stabilize and strengthen concrete structures, the injection of grouts for concrete repair, and the strengthening of prestressed concrete systems will be discussed.

Finally, you will study service life design, design principles, and design modelling. This course is about how best to ensure durability and safety of concrete structures, through maintenance and repair, thus allowing people to use them safely. It will be of interest to students specialising in civil engineering and government officials in charge of drafting tender specifications for public works.

modules.name: Module
modules.details: Introduction to Concrete Structures and Corrosion
modules.description: In this module, you will be introduced to concrete structures and the corrosion that threatens their safety and durability. The fundamentals of corrosion within the context of concrete structures and the necessity to manage it will be unravelled. The mechanism of corrosion, such as carbonation-induced chloride-induced corrosion are discussed.
topics: Introduction to Concrete Structures and Corrosion - Learning Outcomes
Prologue
Corrosion of Embedded Metal: Significance and Fundamentals of Corrosion
Corrosion of Embedded Metal: Carbonation-induced and Chloride-induced Corrosion
Introduction to Concrete Structures and Corrosion – Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.details: Corrosion of Embedded Metal and Reinforcement
modules.description: In this module, about corrosion of embedded metal and reinforcement, you will learn about the construction materials, steel rebars in particular, and why it is necessary to resort to testing for the quality assessment of these rebars. You will also learn about the TM – Ring Test used for assessing the quality of TMT / QST steel rebars. The module also addresses the manufacturing process of some of rebars, their reinforcement, and corrosion in prestressed concrete systems.
topics: Corrosion Embedded Metal and Reinforcement - Learning Outcomes
Types of Reinforcement of TD Bare Steel
TM - Ring Test for Assessing the Quality of TMT / QST Steel Rebars
Types of Reinforcement TD Metallic and Nonmetallic Coated Rebars
Corrosion in Prestressed Concrete
Corrosion of Embedded Metal and Reinforcement - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.description: This module is about the deterioration of cementitious systems. In this module, you will learn about some of the attacks which concrete structures are prone to, namely sulphate attack, biofouling and biogenic acid attack, frost attack, freeze-thaw attack, and fire attack. You will also know how shrinkage, creep, abrasion, and erosion challenge the safety of concrete structures. How to address the various attacks and challenges are also discussed.
topics: Deterioration of Cementitious Systems - Learning Outcomes
Sulphate Attack, Biofouling and Acid Attack
Frost Attack, Freeze-Thaw and Alkali-Silica Reaction
Shrinkage and Creep
Fire Attack, Abrasion and Erosion
Deterioration of Cementitious Systems - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.description: This module covers the condition assessment of concrete structures that must be carried out before any maintenance or repair work. You will learn about exposure conditions of concrete structures through visual inspection and on-site testing. You will also learn about laboratory testing. By the end of the module, you will be introduced to testing on rebars in the field and in laboratories, with a specific emphasis on the mechanical and corrosion testing of rebars.
topics: Condition Assessment of Concrete Structures - Learning Outcomes
Exposure Conditions and Visual Inspections
Testing of Concrete in Laboratory
Mechanical and Corrosion Testing of Rebars
Condition Assessment of Concrete Structures - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.details: Strategies and Materials for Surface Repair
modules.description: In this module dedicated to strategies and materials for surface repair, you will learn about root-cause analyses of the problems of concrete structures and how to address them adequately. You will also learn about the techniques, methods, and strategies to choose the best materials for a specific type of repair. By the end of this module, you will know about the compatibility of repair materials with substrate.
topics: Strategies and Materials for Surface Repair - Learning Outcomes
Strategies and Materials for Surface Repair, Part I
Strategies and materials for Surface Repair, Part II
Strategies and Materials for Surface Repair, Part III
Strategies and Materials for Surface Repair - Lesson Summary

modules.description: In this module, you will learn about anti-corrosive / zinc coating and sacrificial anode cathodic protection and the Galvanic Anode Performance Test. You will also learn about how to protect the steel from corrosion using the Impressed Current Cathodic protection (ICCP), the placement of repair materials, and curing.

Surface Preparation and Protective Treatments, Part II

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module about waterproofing of concrete structures, you will learn about coatings on concrete infrastructures, with a specific emphasis on industrial application of coatings for concrete substrate. You will also learn about the various sources of water that threatens concrete structures and how to waterproof them. Waterproofing of control joints, expansion joints, precast concrete joints and roofs will also be addressed.
topics: Waterproofing on Concrete Structures - Learning Outcomes
Coating on Concrete Infrastructures
Waterproofing on Concrete Structures, Part I
Waterproofing on Concrete Structures, Part II
Waterproofing on Concrete Structures - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.description: This module covers structural strengthening and stabilization. In this module, you will learn about the needs and strategies needed to stabilize and strengthen concrete structures. Specifically addressed are the strengthening of beams and slabs, the types of column failure and how to strengthen them. You will also learn about good practices associated with the repair and strengthening of joints and connections.
topics: Structural Strengthening and Stabilization - Learning Outcomes
Loads Effects and Introduction to S & S
Beams and Slabs
Columns and Walls
Joints and Connections
Structural Strengthening and Stabilization - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, you will learn about injection grouts for concrete repair, the strengthening of prestressed concrete systems, the types of damage the prestressed concrete systems are prone to, and the possible repair scenarios and methods. You will also learn about the approach to systematic repairs and strengthening methodologies, and through case studies, the various types of structures and strengthening techniques.
topics: Tender Specifications and Cases Studies - Learning Outcomes
Injection Grout for Concrete Repair
Structural Repair of Prestressed Concrete Systems
Case Studies on Structural Repair
Tender Specifications and Cases Studies - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.details: Cathodic Protection and Service Life Estimation
modules.description: In this module, you will learn about cathodic protection in concrete structures, the principles of service life design, the service life modelling and the residual service life estimation. After a brief review of service life of RC structures, you will also learn about the most important variables that influence the service life of concrete structures.
topics: Cathodic Protection and Service Life Estimation - Learning Outcomes
Laboratory and Field Studies
Service Life Estimation, Part I
Service Life Estimation, Part II
Cathodic Protection and Service Life Estimation - Lesson Summary
